content: make a trip to your yarn stash for the perfect bear colored yarn and knit your little bear a cozy and super fast hat tuck the hat in with a new baby gift or make for your favorite charity instructions included for both preemie and newborn sizes update pattern includes instructions for both a seamed hat and a hat in the round here is the pattern in larger sizing too 1 1 http //fiberflux blogspot com/2012/02/you-asked-for-it html
